pages.title: Vault Bosses
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Vault Bosses$() are Monsters summoned by certain conditions, typically by activating the last Obelisk inside a Kill the Boss Vault. All Vault Bosses have the ability to teleport, and will heal after not being hit for a duration.
A Vault Robot who teleports, throws snowballs and is a mid-range boss, always having a chance to spawn from Obelisks.
A Vault Robot which is the strongest normal Vault Boss, which always has a chance to be summoned by an Obelisk.
A Blue Blaze which is a ranged Vault Boss, which can only appear between LVL0 - LVL49.
A Monster eye, which is knockback-resistant, fast and deals strong critical damage, spawning past LVL50.
